data.name: Tina & Rook! Cookie Quest!
data.detailed_description:
A couple of idiots are hungry for cookies after playing some games! and for some screw-up reason, you have to go through a whole point-and-click puzzle to get that. Will these 2 idiots get to eat their cookies and enjoy their afternoon?

Features:

  • a 30 minutes point and click puzzle game to get the cookies.
  • Play as the two idiots trying to get the cookies.
  • Enjoy the wackiness of their interaction along the way.
  • Drag and drop items to solve problems along the way.
  • Create new items by combining 2 items.
  • Accompanied by 2 pieces of music that I had to make despite not having any musical background.
  • There's also a dog.

data.short_description: Two idiots are hungry for cookies after playing some games! and for some screw-up reason, you have to go through a whole puzzle to get that. Will these 2 idiots get to eat their cookies and enjoy their afternoon?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
